Posts.EditableText: When I start a game in the offline editor and want to open the debugger, it does not show me the debugger window. In the Windows taskbar I can see that there is another window next to the quest editor, but it is not shown. Does this happen to anyone else or does anyone have a tip?
Posts.HTML: When I start a game in the offline editor and want to open the debugger, it does not show me the debugger window. In the Windows taskbar I can see that there is another window next to the quest editor, but it is not shown. Does this happen to anyone else or does anyone have a tip?

Posts.EditableText:
The last time I used Windows (a few years ago now), some apps would randomly manage to open windows somewhere off the edge of the screen. Could be a related issue?

If it's not changed since I last used it, you might have some luck right-clicking the new window on the taskbar and either pick 'move' (then tap the arrow keys to see if it appears), or 'maximize'.
Posts.HTML:
The last time I used Windows (a few years ago now), some apps would randomly manage to open windows somewhere off the edge of the screen. Could be a related issue?

If it's not changed since I last used it, you might have some luck right-clicking the new window on the taskbar and either pick 'move' (then tap the arrow keys to see if it appears), or 'maximize'.

Posts.EditableText: Yes, thats the solution, shift and right click on the window then maximize. Thanx
Posts.HTML: Yes, thats the solution, shift and right click on the window then maximize. Thanx
